meta.description: Kent Heckenlively is an attorney, science teacher, author, and father of a daughter with autism. He is a founding contributing editor of the website Age of Autism and his work can regularly be found on The Bolen Report. In 2017 he was banned for three years from traveling to Australia for a planned lecture series on corruption at the Centers for Disease Control (CDC). In 2018, his articles at The Bolen Report are regularly shadow-banned by Facebook, so we can only imagine what kind of trouble he’s going to get into as the year progresses.
meta.keywords: coast to coast am, radio, ufos, creatures, extraterrestrial, supernatural, myths, legends, monsters, space, universe, science, mystery, sci-fi, george noory, ian punnett, george knapp, art bell, somewhere in time
